com.aevi.print.model

Class ImageRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.print.model.ImageRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintRow

    public class ImageRow
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrintRow
    This class represents an image line in a PrintPayload.

      ImageRow(android.graphics.Bitmap image)

        public static final int DEFAULT_CONTRAST_LEVEL

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageRow

        public ImageRow(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
        Creates a left aligned image row at normal contrast (50) with the given bitmap. NOTE: If the (unscaled) image is too large to print onto the page it will be scaled by the printer driver to fit the width.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to print. This parameter must not be null.

      • ImageRow

        public ImageRow(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                boolean scaleToFit)
        Creates a left aligned image row at normal contrast (50) with the given bitmap.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to print. This parameter must not be null.
        scaleToFit - If true the image will be scaled down to fit the page if it is too large. If false the image will be cropped.

    • Method Detail

      • isScaleToFit

        public boolean isScaleToFit()
        Returns:
        True if this image should be scaled to fit the full width of the output paper.

      • getImage

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getImage()
        Gets the image of this image row.
        Returns:
        the image.

        public Alignment getAlignmentStyle()
        Gets the alignment of this image row.
        Returns:
        the alignment,

      • align

        public ImageRow align(Alignment alignment)
        Sets the alignment of this image row.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment to set,
        Returns:
        This ImageRow object

      • getContrastLevel

        public int getContrastLevel()
        Gets the contrast level of this image row. The contrast level is a percentage value between 0 and 100, where 100 is full contrast.
        Returns:
        the contrastLevel to set,

      • contrastLevel

        public ImageRow contrastLevel(int contrastLevel)
        Sets the contrast level of this image row. The contrast level is a value between 0 and 100, where 0 is full white and 100 is full black. If a value lower then 0 of higher then 100 is given an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        contrastLevel - the contrastLevel to set
        Returns:
        This ImageRow object

        public java.lang.String toJson()
